title: This is NOT a MAC PRO...It's an Airflow Case!
description: The MetallicGear Neo Pro might look a lot like an Apple Mac Pro but there's a reason for that:  the cheese grater design actually increases airflow while also decreasing fan noise.  Meanwhile the MetallicGear Matrix uses a unique ARGB light panel on its front that looks amazing without adding much cost.    A special thanks to Phanteks, Thermaltake, be quiet! and Razer.  Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- #metallicpro #neopro #neomatrix #hardwarecanucks
